snippet: Bill Condon ("Dreamgirls") will direct the musical about Siamese twins, slated for runs at La Jolla Playhouse and the Kennedy Center.
abstract: Bill Condon ("Dreamgirls") will direct the musical about Siamese twins, slated for runs at La Jolla Playhouse and the Kennedy Center.

headline.main: Reimagined 'Side Show' Musical Has Dates on Two Coasts
